brief: This is a brown noise generator.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Sets amplitude, add and pan position with one method.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Changes the amplitude/volume of the noise generator.

methods.name: add()
methods.desc: Offset the output of this generator by a fixed value.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Pan the generator in a stereo panorama.

description: This is a brown noise generator. Brown noise has a decrease of 6db per octave.
name: BrownNoise
